packages <- c("devtools","knitr","tidyverse","ggthemes", "ggmap", "educationdata")

packages <- lapply(packages, FUN = function(x) {

    install.packages(x)
  library(x, character.only = TRUE)
  }
}

                                topic = 'outcome-measures', filters = list(year = 2017),
